import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { FileText, MessageCircle, Globe, Shield, Zap, Users, ArrowRight, CheckCircle, BookOpen, Search, } from "lucide-react"; import { useLanguage } from "../contexts/LanguageContext"; import { translations } from "../translations"; import LanguageSwitcher from "./LanguageSwitcher"; const LandingPage = () => { const { language } = useLanguage(); const t = translations[language]; return (
